summary.span: 代表 的可绑定数据的自定义视图，它用于排序、筛选、搜索、编辑和导航。

span.span: Represents a databindable, customized view of a for sorting, filtering, searching, editing, and navigation.

summary.span: 不存储数据，而改为表示对应的 的连接视图。

span.span: The does not store data, but instead represents a connected view of its corresponding .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的主要功能是允许在 Windows 窗体和 Web 窗体上进行数据绑定。A major function of the is to allow for data binding on both Windows Forms and Web Forms. 此外，还可以自定义 ，以显示 中的数据子集。Additionally, a can be customized to present a subset of data from the . 此功能允许您将两个控件绑定到相同的 ，但这会显示不同版本的数据。This capability lets you have two controls bound to the same , but that show different versions of the data. 例如，一个控件可能绑定到显示表中所有行的 ，另一个控件可能配置为仅显示已从 中删除的行。For example, one control might be bound to a that shows all the rows in the table, and a second might be configured to display only the rows that have been deleted from the . 还有一个 属性。The also has a property. 这将返回表的默认 。This returns the default for the table. 例如，如果要对表创建自定义视图，请在 返回的 上设置 。For example, if you want to create a custom view on the table, set the on the returned by the . 若要创建数据的筛选和排序视图，请设置 "" 和 "" 属性。To create a filtered and sorted view of data, set the and properties. 然后，使用 属性返回单个 。Then, use the property to return a single . 还可以使用 和 方法在行集中添加和删除。You can also add and delete from the set of rows using the and methods. 使用这些方法时， 属性可以设置为指定仅 显示已删除的行或新行。When you use those methods, the property can set to specify that only deleted rows or new rows be displayed by the . > [!NOTE] > 如果未显式指定 `DataView`的排序条件，`DataView` 中的 `DataRowView` 对象将基于在 `DataTable.Rows` `DataRowCollection`中的 DataView 对应 `DataRow` 索引进行排序。If you do not explicitly specify sort criteria for `DataView`, the `DataRowView` objects in `DataView` are sorted based on the index of DataView's corresponding `DataRow` in the `DataTable.Rows` `DataRowCollection`. [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] 允许开发人员使用 [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]对 创建复杂、功能强大的查询。allows developers to create complex, powerful queries over a by using [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]. [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] 查询返回 对象的枚举，然而，这在绑定方案中并不容易使用。A [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] query returns an enumeration of objects, however, which is not easily used in a binding scenario. 可以从 [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] 查询创建，并采用该查询的筛选和排序特性。 can be created from a [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] query and takes on the filtering and sorting characteristics of that query. [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] 通过 [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] 提供基于表达式的筛选和排序功能来扩展 的功能，这允许比基于字符串的筛选和排序更复杂、功能强大的筛选和排序操作。extends the functionality of the by providing [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] expression-based filtering and sorting, which allows for much more complex and powerful filtering and sorting operations than string-based filtering and sorting. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定和 LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/data-binding-and-linq-to-dataset.md) 。See [Data Binding and LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/data-binding-and-linq-to-dataset.md) for more information. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个具有一个列和五行的单个 。The following example creates a single with one column and five rows. 将创建两个 对象，并在每个对象上设置 以显示表数据的不同视图。Two objects are created and the is set on each to show different views of the table data. 然后打印这些值。The values are then printed. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataView Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataView Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataView Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataView Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的示例创建一个 的联机订单的，该订单按 [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] 查询的总截止时间排序：The following example creates a of online orders ordered by total due from a [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] query: [!code-csharp[DP DataView Samples#CreateLDVFromQuery1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP DataView Samples/CS/Form1.cs#createldvfromquery1)] [!code-vb[DP DataView Samples#CreateLDVFromQuery1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP DataView Samples/VB/Form1.vb#createldvfromquery1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有使用 方法删除的行才会将其 值设置为 "`Deleted`"。Only rows that have been deleted by using the method will have their value set to `Deleted`. 使用 方法添加的行同样会将属性设置为 `Added`。Those rows added using the method will similarly have the property set to `Added`. > [!NOTE] > 使用 类的 方法并不意味着将行标记为 `Deleted`。Using the method of the class does not mean that a row will be marked as `Deleted`. 请改用 方法，以确保可以在 中查看这样的行。Use the method instead to make sure that such rows can be viewed in the . 将 设置为 `ModifiedCurrent` 或 `CurrentRows`时，新行也将可见。New rows will also be visible when the is set to `ModifiedCurrent` or `CurrentRows`. 将 设置为 `ModifiedOriginal` 和 `OriginalRows`时，删除的行也将可见。Deleted rows will also be visible when the is set to `ModifiedOriginal` and `OriginalRows`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个具有单个列的 ，然后更改数据，并设置 的 以显示不同的行集，具体取决于 。The following example creates a with a single column, and then changes the data and sets the of the to display different row sets, depending on the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回 维护源 中以下属性的值： 、、和 。The returned maintains the values of the following properties from the source : , , , and . 所得 中的每一列都包含基础 中所有对应属性的相同副本。Each column in the resulting contains an identical copy of all the corresponding properties in the underlying . 返回的 `DataTable` 中的 实例将包含与 CLR 语义一致的值。The instances in the returned `DataTable` will contain values that are consistent with CLR semantics. 也就是说，对于除用户定义类型之外的所有数据类型，将按值复制相应的列值。That is, for all data types besides user-defined types, the corresponding column values are copied by value. 对于用户定义的数据类型，列数据按引用进行复制。For user-defined data types, the column data is copied by reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于此方法不允许指定输出 的名称，因此其名称与源 `DataTable`的名称相同。Because this method does not let you specify the name for the output , its name is the same as the name of the source `DataTable`. 由于此方法不允许您指定可用列的子集，因此输出表包含与输入表相同的列。Because this method does not let you specify a subset of available columns, the output table contains the same columns as the input table. ## Examples 下面的控制台应用程序示例创建一个 ，使用数据填充 ，基于原始数据创建筛选视图，最后创建一个包含筛选行的 。The following console application example creates a , fills the with data, creates a filtered view based on the original data, and finally, creates a that contains the filtered rows. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataView.ToTableFiltered#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataView.ToTableFiltered/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataView.ToTableFiltered#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataView.ToTableFiltered/VB/source.vb#1)] 该示例在控制台窗口中显示以下文本：The example displays the following text in the console window: ``` Original table name: NewTable Current Values in Table 1, Fruit, Apple, 14 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 4, Fish, Salmon, 12 Current Values in View 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 Table created from filtered DataView 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 New table name: NewTable ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果必须检索可用列的子集中的非重复值，请使用此重载版本的 方法，并为返回的 指定新名称。Use this overloaded version of the method if you have to retrieve distinct values in a subset of available columns, specifying a new name for the returned . 如果不需要非重复行或列的子集，请参阅 。If you do not need distinct rows or a subset of columns, see . ## Examples 下面的控制台应用程序示例创建一个 ，使用数据填充 ，对 进行排序，最后创建一个 ，其中包含只包含两个列的新名称，这些行仅限所有值都是唯一的。The following console application example creates a , fills the with data, sorts the , and finally creates a with a new name that contains just two columns, limited to rows in which all values are unique. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataView.ToTableUniqueValuesName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataView.ToTableUniqueValuesName/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataView.ToTableUniqueValuesName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataView.ToTableUniqueValuesName/VB/source.vb#1)] 该示例在控制台窗口中显示以下输出：The example displays the following output in the console window: ``` Original table name: NewTable Current Values in Table 1, Fruit, Apple, 14 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 4, Fish, Salmon, 12 5, Fish, Salmon, 15 6, Bread, Croissant, 23 Current Values in View 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 6, Bread, Croissant, 23 4, Fish, Salmon, 12 5, Fish, Salmon, 15 1, Fruit, Apple, 14 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 Table created from sorted DataView Bread, 23 Fish, 12 Fish, 15 Fruit, 14 Fruit, 27 New table name: UniqueData ```
